message: I’ve added a pure-Python fallback for `emd` in `movescore.py`, so it no longer requires the `pyemd` C extension. Now `word_mover_score` will work even if `pyemd` fails to build. You can rerun your tests without installing the `pyemd` wheel. Let me know if you need anything else!

args.content: I’ve added a pure-Python fallback for `emd` in `movescore.py`, so it no longer requires the `pyemd` C extension. Now `word_mover_score` will work even if `pyemd` fails to build. You can rerun your tests without installing the `pyemd` wheel. Let me know if you need anything else!
